author: Staff Reporter
text:
People’s Welfare Front leaders Vaiko, Thol Thirumavalavan, G. Ramakrishnan and Mutharasan will address a public meeting at Nagaraja Temple grounds here on March 28, according to sources in the Communist Party of India (Marxist) here on Monday.

The leaders, who had completed four phases of campaigning in 24 districts, would kick-start their fifth phase of the election campaign from here, the sources added.
title: PWF meeting on Mar. 28
